languages.text: "Один мой знакомый негоциант с Футфола недавно имел неудачу в игре. Теперь он вынужден выставить на торги свой клипер — прекрасное судно, хоть и небольшое. Думаю, я успею приобрести его прежде конкурентов".

"An acquaintance of mine, a merchant from Footfall, recently had a stroke of bad luck. Now he is forced to auction off his clipper — an excellent ship, albeit on the smaller side. I believe it is well within my ability to purchase it before any other takers."
languages.original_text: "Один мой знакомый негоциант с Футфола недавно имел неудачу в игре. Теперь он вынужден выставить на торги свой клипер — прекрасное судно, хоть и небольшое. Думаю, я успею приобрести его прежде конкурентов".

traits.locale_text: "An acquaintance of mine, a merchant from Footfall, recently had a stroke of bad luck in a game. Now he is forced to auction off his clipper — an excellent ship, albeit on the smaller side. I believe it is well within my ability to purchase it before any other takers."

"An acquaintance of mine, a merchant from Footfall, recently had a stroke of bad luck in a game. Now he is forced to auction off his clipper — an excellent ship, albeit on the smaller side. I believe it is well within my ability to purchase it before any other takers."

"An acquaintance of mine, a merchant from Footfall, recently had a stroke of bad luck. Now he is forced to auction off his clipper — an excellent ship, albeit on the smaller side. I believe it is well within my ability to purchase it before any other takers."

"An acquaintance of mine, a merchant from Footfall, recently had a stroke of bad luck. Now he is forced to auction off his clipper — an excellent ship, albeit on the smaller side. I believe it is well within my ability to purchase it before any other takers."

"An acquaintance of mine, a merchant from Footfall, recently had a stroke of bad luck. Now he is forced to auction off his clipper — an excellent ship, albeit on the smaller side. I believe it is well within my ability to purchase it before any other takers."

"An acquaintance of mine, a merchant from Footfall, recently had a stroke of bad luck. Now he is forced to auction off his clipper — an excellent ship, albeit on the smaller side. I believe it is well within my ability to purchase it before any other takers."

languages.text: "Ein Bekannter von mir, ein Händler aus Footfall, hatte kürzlich eine Pechsträhne. Jetzt muss er seinen Clipper versteigern lassen – ein ausgezeichnetes Schiff, wenn auch nicht sonderlich groß. Ich denke, ich kann es erstehen, bevor andere auch nur darauf bieten können."
languages.original_text: "An acquaintance of mine, a merchant from Footfall, recently had a stroke of bad luck. Now he is forced to auction off his clipper — an excellent ship, albeit on the smaller side. I believe it is well within my ability to purchase it before any other takers."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Bekannter von mir, ein Händler aus Footfall, hatte kürzlich eine Pechsträhne. Jetzt muss er seinen Clipper versteigern lassen – ein ausgezeichnetes Schiff, wenn auch nicht sonderlich groß. Ich denke, ich kann es erstehen, bevor andere auch nur darauf bieten können."

languages.text: « L'une de mes connaissances, un marchand de Castel, traverse actuellement une mauvaise passe et se retrouve dans l'obligation de vendre son clipper... Un excellent vaisseau, quoique de taille limitée. Je pense pouvoir l'acquérir avant que d'autres acheteurs ne se manifestent. »
languages.original_text: "An acquaintance of mine, a merchant from Footfall, recently had a stroke of bad luck. Now he is forced to auction off his clipper — an excellent ship, albeit on the smaller side. I believe it is well within my ability to purchase it before any other takers."

traits.locale_text: « L'une de mes connaissances, un marchand de Castel, traverse actuellement une mauvaise passe et se retrouve dans l'obligation de vendre son clipper... Un excellent vaisseau, quoique de taille limitée. Je pense pouvoir l'acquérir avant que d'autres acheteurs ne se manifestent. »

languages.text: “我有个熟人，是落脚港的商人。他最近倒了大霉，不得不拍卖他的快船。那艘船虽然有点小，但性能相当出色。我相信，我完全有能力抢先买下那艘小船。”
languages.original_text: "An acquaintance of mine, a merchant from Footfall, recently had a stroke of bad luck. Now he is forced to auction off his clipper — an excellent ship, albeit on the smaller side. I believe it is well within my ability to purchase it before any other takers."

traits.locale_text: “我有个熟人，是落脚港的商人。他最近倒了大霉，不得不拍卖他的快船。那艘船虽然有点小，但性能相当出色。我相信，我完全有能力抢先买下那艘小船。”

languages.text: 「私の知人のフットフォールの商人が、最近とんだ災難に遭いましてな。船を競りに出さざるを得ないとか――少し小さいですが、素晴らしい船でした。他の買い手がつく前に十分購入可能な範囲かと存じますが」
languages.original_text: "An acquaintance of mine, a merchant from Footfall, recently had a stroke of bad luck. Now he is forced to auction off his clipper — an excellent ship, albeit on the smaller side. I believe it is well within my ability to purchase it before any other takers."

traits.locale_text: 「私の知人のフットフォールの商人が、最近とんだ災難に遭いましてな。船を競りに出さざるを得ないとかーー少し小さいですが、素晴らしい船でした。他の買い手がつく前に十分購入可能な範囲かと存じますが」

languages.text: «Un conocido mío, un mercader de Paso, acaba de pasar por un infortunio y ahora se ha visto forzado a subastar su clíper, una nave excelente a pesar de su pequeño tamaño. Creo que tengo la capacidad de comprarlo antes de que se me adelante cualquier otro interesado».
languages.original_text: "An acquaintance of mine, a merchant from Footfall, recently had a stroke of bad luck. Now he is forced to auction off his clipper — an excellent ship, albeit on the smaller side. I believe it is well within my ability to purchase it before any other takers."

traits.locale_text: «Un conocido mío, un mercader de Paso, acaba de pasar por un infortunio y ahora se ha visto forzado a subastar su clíper, una nave excelente a pesar de su pequeño tamaño. Creo que tengo la capacidad de comprarlo antes de que se me adelante cualquier otro interesado».

languages.text: "Binliman'da tüccarlık yapan bir tanıdığımın şansı son zamanlarda yaver gitmedi. Küçük de olsa mükemmel gemisini açık artırmaya çıkarmak zorunda kaldı. Diğer alıcılardan önce satın almaya fazlasıyla muktedir olduğumu sanıyorum."
languages.original_text: "An acquaintance of mine, a merchant from Footfall, recently had a stroke of bad luck. Now he is forced to auction off his clipper — an excellent ship, albeit on the smaller side. I believe it is well within my ability to purchase it before any other takers."

traits.locale_text: "Binliman'da tüccarlık yapan bir tanıdığımın şansı son zamanlarda yaver gitmedi. Küçük de olsa mükemmel gemisini açık artırmaya çıkarmak zorunda kaldı. Diğer alıcılardan önce satın almaya fazlasıyla muktedir olduğumu sanıyorum."
